programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. SEAL Team
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hunger Games: A Revolta - Parte 1
programme.desc: Após sobreviver à temível arena dos Jogos Vorazes, Katniss Everdeen está desanimada. Desde que a Capital destruiu o Distrito 12, ela refugiou-se no Distrito 13. Agora, a presidência quer que ela lidere uma "resistência" e mobilize a população para salvar o povo do jogo da grande Capital.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. programme.desc: Deputy: Created by Will Beall. With Stephen Dorff, Yara Martinez, Brian Van Holt, Bex Taylor-Klaus. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324","dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Perdido em Marte
programme.desc: Durante uma missão a Marte, o astronauta Mark Watney é dado como morto e deixado para trás pela tripulação. Mas Watney sobreviveu e encontra-se preso e só num planeta hostil. Agora, terá de encontrar forma de enviar para a Terra um sinal de que está vivo.

programme.title: Arranha-Céus
programme.desc: O edifício mais alto e seguro do mundo está em chamas e Will, um perito em segurança que ali se deslocou em trabalho, é injustamente culpado pelo incêndio. Em fuga, Will tem de encontrar os culpados e salvar a sua família, presa dentro do edifício.

programme.title: Vigarista à Vista
programme.desc: Sandy Patterson recebe um telefonema de uma mulher que o avisa que tentaram roubar a sua identidade. Essa pessoa dá-lhe a conhecer um novo modelo de proteção e pede-lhe alguns dados. O que Sandy não pode imaginar é que, enquanto está a fornecer os seus dados, a sua identidade está a ser roubada...

programme.title: Pai Infernal
programme.desc: Donny educa o filho sozinho até aos 18 anos. Sem se verem há anos, decide aparecer de surpresa na véspera do casamento do filho. Ao tentar reavivar a ligação de ambos, Donny é forçado a lidar com as repercussões das suas más competências parentais.

programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Young, Stalked and Pregnant
programme.desc: Audrey é aceite numa universidade de prestígio e descobre que está grávida do namorado, que não está a enveredar por bons caminhos. Quando faz planos para um futuro do qual o namorado não faz parte, ele e a sua mãe instável reagem, determinados a fazer Audrey mudar de ideias ou a livrarem-se dela.

programme.title: The Surrogate
programme.desc: Um professor universitário e a mulher não conseguem ter filhos. Quando recorrem a uma barriga de aluguer, estão longe de imaginar que aquilo que poderia ser um sonho realizado se vai transformar no seu maior pesadelo.

programme.title: Harvest Moon
programme.desc: Jennifer fica devastada quando descobre que a família está falida. Numa tentativa de restituir a fortuna, muda-se para uma quinta com problemas, na esperança de lhe dar uma nova vida. Mas as mudanças que propõe não são bem-vindas pelo dono da quinta, Brett, e todos tentam que ela se vá embora.

programme.title: The Daughter Stalker
programme.desc: Após a morte da irmã, com quem não tinha contacto, Carly fica surpreendida por saber que consta no testamento como guardiã de Mallie. Quando se desloca para honrar o desejo, Carly percebe que Mallie recebeu uma grande herança, e nem toda a gente está contente com a existência de uma irmã.

programme.title: Ao Sabor do Verão
programme.desc: Gabby muda-se para a cidade de Bright Shore, Massachusetts, para abrir um restaurante, uma paixão antiga. Ao chegar, conhece Caleb, um pai solteiro que tem o seu próprio restaurante e com quem irá competir pelo prémio do Taste of Summer Food Festival.

programme.title: Autumn Dreams
programme.desc: Annie e Ben decidem casar em segredo, mas o pai dela consegue a anulação. Determinados, planeiam fugir, mas ela corre para o hospital quando o pai tem um ataque cardíaco e deixa Ben sozinho. Anos mais tarde, os seus mundos ficam virados do avesso quando descobrem que, afinal, ainda estão casados.

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNiMmNmZWQtMTJlMS00NWIyLTlhNmEtNmI3M2Q1YjczMGI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR18,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Backstabbed
programme.desc: Uma dona de casa em dificuldades decide arranjar um emprego como agente imobiliária. Mas acaba por colocar a sua vida em perigo, ao aceitar um emprego com uma chefe que está disposta a tudo (até a matar) para fechar um negócio.

programme.title: The Dating Coach
programme.desc: Um contabilista dá por si com uma consultora sentimental, a sua paixão de liceu. Graças à consultora, ele consegue a mulher bonita que ambicionava há algum tempo, mas apercebe-se de que são incompatíveis. Entretanto, as suas lições com a sua paixão de adolescência reacendem sentimentos antigos.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.sub-title: In The Valley of The Shadows

programme.title: Dater's Handbook
programme.desc: Após se apaixonar de novo pelo homem errado, Cassandra recorre à especialista em relacionamentos, a Dra. Susie, e ao seu último livro de autoajuda. Logo começa a testá-lo em dois pretendentes: Robert, o tipo divertido e aventureiro que conhece bem, e George, o tipo confiável que o manual recomenda.

programme.title: The Perfect Cheerleader
programme.desc: Quando entra na universidade dos seus sonhos e é escolhida para a claque, Cassie Talbot sente que o mundo está a mudar para melhor! Tem novos amigos, adora fazer parte da claque e as coisas correm-lhe bem. Porém, quando um homem bem-parecido entra na sua vida, ela descobre um segredo negro.

programme.title: A Lista de Desejos
programme.desc: Darcy encontra uma lista de pertences da sua falecida mãe, que ela nunca conheceu, e que esta tencionava dar a alguns amigos próximos e família. É então que decide dar o devido destino a esses objetos e realizar o desejo da mãe.

programme.title: As Palavras Que Nunca Te Direi
programme.desc: Viúvo solitário, Garret Blake constrói barcos para viver. Quando Theresa Osborne chega à aldeia onde ele vive, descobre que é ele o autor de uma mensagem de amor que ela encontrou numa garrafa e que a emocionou profundamente.

programme.title: All Yours
programme.desc: Cass, uma advogada de sucesso e mãe de dois filhos, está à procura de uma ama. Matthew não consegue assentar, até que o pai o desafia numa aposta. Para levar a melhor, Matthew tem uma entrevista com Cass, que recusa contratá-lo. Mas é forçada a fazê-lo quando não consegue encontrar mais ninguém.

programme.title: Selvagens
programme.desc: Dois amigos, Ben e Chon, gerem um lucrativo negócio de marijuana na Califórnia, onde também partilham o amor da bela Ophelia. Tudo corre bem até que um cartel mexicano decide forçar uma parceria, o que coloca à prova o laço inquebrável que os une.

programme.title: O Caçador
programme.desc: Michael, Steven e Nick são três jovens operários da Pensilvânia prestes a partirem para o Vietname: no dia da partida, o trio sai para caçar nas florestas que se prepara para deixar uma última vez. Vencedor de cinco Óscares em 1979, "O Caçador" é um dos filmes mais polémicos sobre o Vietname.

programme.title: Scary Movie 4 - Que Susto de Filme!
programme.desc: Cindy descobre que a casa onde mora é assombrada por um pequeno rapaz, pelo que parte em busca de quem o assassinou e quais os motivos. Por sua vez, há Alien "Tr-iPods" a invadir o mundo, e ela tem de descobrir o seu segredo de modo a conseguir travá-los.

programme.title: Descarrilada
programme.desc: O pai de Amy levou-a a acreditar, desde pequena, que a monogamia não era realista. Agora escritora numa revista, Amy rege-se por esse lema. No entanto, tudo muda quando percebe que se está a apaixonar pelo tema do seu novo artigo: o charmoso e bem-sucedido médico Aaron Conners.

programme.title: Perseguição Escaldante
programme.desc: Cooper, uma agente da polícia, rígida e cumpridora das regras, tenta proteger a viúva de um traficante de droga, uma mulher sensual e extrovertida, enquanto atravessam o Texas. A dupla é perseguida por polícias corruptos e perigosos assassinos.

programme.title: Doidos por Mary
programme.desc: Um adolescente complexado, o cromo do liceu, esbarra na miúda mais gira da escola e descobre, treze anos depois, que ainda está caído por ela, contratando um detetive para a descobrir.

programme.title: Contrabando
programme.desc: Chris abandonou a sua vida de crime, mas após Andy arruinar um negócio ao seu impiedoso patrão, Chris vê-se obrigado a voltar àquilo que melhor faz: contrabandear. Forma equipa com Sebastian para um golpe final no Panamá, mas quando o plano cai, terá de recorrer às suas enferrujadas habilidades!

programme.title: Perseguição Diabólica
programme.desc: Um estudante universitário, a trabalhar num projeto científico inovador, vê-se envolvido numa teia de espionagem industrial, intriga governamental e assassinato. Ele e Lily fazem parte da equipa de investigação, sendo considerados os principais suspeitos pela morte do responsável do projeto.

programme.title: Velocidade Terminal
programme.desc: Um paraquedista e uma ex-agente do KGB juntam-se para evitar que a máfia russa roube um carregamento de ouro.

programme.title: Mestres da Ilusão
programme.desc: Durante os seus espetáculos, uma super equipa, que reúne os maiores ilusionistas do mundo, executa ousados golpes contra líderes corruptos, provocando uma "chuva" dos lucros roubados sobre a audiência. O truque é estarem sempre um passo à frente das autoridades.

programme.title: Alleycats - Pedalar Ou Morrer
programme.desc: Um estafeta de bicicleta é testemunha de um homicídio. A sua curiosidade sobre o caso faz com que rapidamente se veja envolvido numa trama de corrupção, política e corridas ilegais.

programme.title: Corrida Mortal 2
programme.desc: No futuro, a economia dos EUA cai, originando um aumento descontrolado da delinquência violenta. São criadas prisões privadas, governadas por criminosos e sociopatas. A pior é Terminal Island, onde chega Carl Lucas. Ele será protagonista da "Corrida da Morte", que tem como prémio a liberdade.

programme.title: Corrida Mortal: Inferno
programme.desc: Condenado pelo homicídio de polícias, Carl Lucas, ou "Frankenstein", é a nova estrela da Death Race. Se ganhar a corrida, conseguirá sair da prisão, juntamente com a sua equipa de mecânicos. Lucas entra no concurso mais cruel da sua vida, perante os adversários mais impiedosos de sempre!

programme.title: Ordem para Matar
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, uma sociedade baseada na tecnologia coloca os humanos contra máquinas assassinas.

programme.title: A Ilha
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, há uma entidade utópica baseada na vida do século XX, que procura recriá-la ao pormenor. Lincoln sonha chegar a um local chamado "a Ilha", o único ponto não contaminado do planeta. Uma lotaria diária garante levar para lá os sortudos, ao encontro de uma Terra ideal e perdida...

programme.title: Besta Sexy
programme.desc: O mafioso Dan Logan tem a tarefa de recrutar Gal, um ex-assaltante de cofres, para um último grande assalto em Londres.

programme.title: La La Land - Melodia de Amor
programme.desc: Sebastian, um pianista de jazz, e Mia, uma aspirante a atriz, apaixonam-se perdidamente. Os dois apoiam-se na sua luta para terem carreiras de sucesso, mas Los Angeles é uma cidade competitiva, que nem sempre tem lugar para o amor sincero...

programme.title: Morte No Nilo
programme.desc: Enquanto aproveita um luxuoso cruzeiro pelo Nilo, Hercule Poirot depara-se com o homicídio de uma mulher que tinha herdado uma fortuna recentemente. Conseguirá Poirot identificar o assassino antes do final da viagem?

programme.title: Morte ao Sol
programme.desc: De férias numa ilha da costa sul de Devon, Poirot irá ter que investigar a morte de uma atriz que é encontrada na praia. Ao interrogar todos os hóspedes do hotel, apercebe-se que muitos têm motivos para desejar a morte de Kenneth Marshall, contudo, todos eles possuem um álibi inabalável.

programme.title: Um Crime no Expresso do Oriente
programme.desc: Tendo acabado de resolver um caso em Istambul, o mundialmente famoso detetive Hercule Poirot segue viagem a bordo do luxuoso Expresso do Oriente. Quando o comboio para devido a uma avalanche, ficando bloqueado, é encontrado um cadáver. A viagem transforma-se numa autêntica caça ao assassino.

programme.title: Um Crime No Expresso do Oriente
programme.desc: Década de 1930. Um grupo de pessoas encontra-se a bordo do luxuoso Expresso do Oriente. Mas a viagem é perturbada quando um americano é encontrado brutalmente assassinado. Por coincidência, o detetive Hercule Poirot, cujos feitos lhe valeram fama internacional, encontra-se entre os passageiros.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Revelando habilidades de luta tão letais quanto o seu lendário intelecto, o detetive Sherlock Holmes vai lutar como nunca para derrubar um novo inimigo e desvendar uma conspiração mortal que pode destruir Inglaterra. Sempre com a ajuda do Dr. Watson, o seu leal parceiro.

programme.title: Corrida Mortal 2
programme.desc: No futuro, a economia dos EUA cai, originando um aumento descontrolado da delinquência violenta. São criadas prisões privadas, governadas por criminosos e sociopatas. A pior é Terminal Island, onde chega Carl Lucas. Ele será protagonista da "Corrida da Morte", que tem como prémio a liberdade.

programme.title: Corrida Mortal: Inferno
programme.desc: Condenado pelo homicídio de polícias, Carl Lucas, ou "Frankenstein", é a nova estrela da Death Race. Se ganhar a corrida, conseguirá sair da prisão, juntamente com a sua equipa de mecânicos. Lucas entra no concurso mais cruel da sua vida, perante os adversários mais impiedosos de sempre!

programme.title: Ordem para Matar
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, uma sociedade baseada na tecnologia coloca os humanos contra máquinas assassinas.

programme.title: Força Delta
programme.desc: Uma equipa de elite liderada por Scott McCoy e Nick Alexander entra em ação para eliminar um grupo de terroristas libaneses que desviou um avião comercial.

programme.title: Força Delta 2 - Operação Estrangulamento
programme.desc: Quando o barão da droga Ramon Cota captura uma equipa americana de agentes de narcóticos, bem como um membro da equipa de elite Força Delta, a equipa de Scott McCoy entra em ação. Contra todas as probabilidades, McCoy e o seu esquadrão têm de lutar numa batalha intensa.

programme.title: Máquina Zero
programme.desc: Jarhead (ou Máquina Zero) é uma alcunha autoimposta aos Fuzileiros. Este filme segue Swofford, um alistado de terceira geração, que traz uma espingarda e um amontoado de coisas às costas pelos desertos do Médio Oriente, sem qualquer proteção contra o calor intolerável ou os soldados iraquianos.

programme.title: Freddy Contra Jason
programme.desc: Freddy Krueger e Jason Voorhees voltam para aterrorizar a população adolescente! Em busca de vingança, Freddy manipula Jason, que estava com ele no Inferno, para a população de Elm Street pensar que ele voltou. Mas os dois acabam por se desentender...

programme.title: Encomenda Armadilhada
programme.desc: Um estafeta de bicicleta em Nova Iorque recolhe o seu último envelope do dia. Mas esta encomenda é diferente e desperta o interesse de um polícia corrupto, que irá iniciar uma perseguição de vida ou morte pelas ruas de Manhattan.

programme.title: No Mesmo Tom
programme.desc: A vida de um músico de rua cruza-se nas ruas de Dublin com a de uma imigrante que vende flores. Juntos vão escrever, ensaiar e gravar canções sobre as suas histórias de amor.

programme.title: Fintar o Amor
programme.desc: Uma antiga estrela de futebol regressa à sua cidade natal, na tentativa de pôr alguma ordem na sua vida. Enquanto procura reconstruir o relacionamento com o seu filho, acaba recrutado como treinador da equipa infantil de futebol.

programme.title: Sempre que Te Vejo
programme.desc: Charlie é um jovem em luto pela morte do irmão. No entanto, o laço entre ambos é tão forte que todas as noites Charlie brinca e fala com o fantasma do irmão. Quando se apaixona, Charlie tem de optar por ficar ou perseguir a sua felicidade.

programme.title: Lembra-te de Mim
programme.desc: Após a morte prematura do irmão, que culminou com a separação dos pais, Tyler sente-se perdido e descrente. A viver em Nova Iorque, vive revoltado e mantém um relacionamento conflituoso com o pai. Mas quando conhece Ally, o amor cresce entre os dois e parece determinado a quebrar todas as defesas.

programme.title: A Rapariga Dinamarquesa
programme.desc: Uma história de amor inspirada na vida do casal dinamarquês, Lili Elbe e Gerda Wegener. O casamento e o trabalho de ambos ganham um novo sentido, à medida que vivem a arrebatadora viagem de Lili como a primeira transgénero.

programme.title: Golo!
programme.desc: Como milhões de miúdos à volta do mundo, Santiago acalenta o sonho de ser um jogador de futebol profissional. No entanto, como vive em Barrios, em Los Angeles, ele pensa que é apenas isso, um sonho. Até ao dia em que faz provas de seleção para o Newcastle United.

programme.title: Terra Violenta
programme.desc: Um homem misterioso chega a uma pequena cidade em busca de vingança pelo assassinato do seu amigo. Entretanto, acaba por arrastar toda a população de inadaptados para uma batalha sangrenta.

programme.title: A Troca
programme.desc: As preces de Christine Collins são ouvidas quando é encontrado o seu filho, que tinha sido raptado. Mas, por entre o frenesim mediático da foto do reencontro, apercebe-se de que a criança não é o seu filho. Enfrentando polícias corruptos e um público cético, ela procura desesperadamente respostas.

programme.title: Até à Morte
programme.desc: Um cangalheiro irlandês lucra quando um bando de foras da lei assume o controlo de uma pequena cidade fronteiriça americana. Mas à medida que o caos se instala, é apenas uma questão de tempo até que tenha de proteger a sua família da carnificina.

programme.title: O Estrangeiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que é contratado para levar uma encomenda de França para a Alemanha, vai descobrir que transporta algo de grande importância. Inesperadamente, acaba envolvido numa rede de traição e engano.

programme.title: Os Condenados 2
programme.desc: Um ex-caçador de recompensas encontra-se em fuga como parte de um torneio Condemned reformulado, no qual os condenados são forçados a lutar entre si até a morte. Toda a ação integra um jogo que é transmitido para o público...

programme.title: Tempos Cruéis
programme.desc: Jim, um ex-soldado, continua a ser atormentado pelos pesadelos da Guerra do Golfo. Ele procura desesperadamente um emprego para casar com a namorada mexicana e trazê-la para os EUA. À deriva, comete diversos atos violentos e criminosos na companhia do melhor amigo, que está desempregado como ele.

programme.title: Dia de Treino
programme.desc: Alonzo Harris, um polícia veterano da brigada de Narcóticos, insiste em trabalhar nos limites da legalidade na luta contra o tráfico de droga e a delinquência criminosa de Los Angeles. Só que agora Alonzo tem um novo colega, Jake, um agente idealista em comparação com ele e os seus métodos.

programme.title: Amanhecer Violento
programme.desc: Uma cidade americana é ocupada por militares estrangeiros e a população local é feita prisioneira. Determinados a resistir e lutar, alguns jovens procuram refúgio nos bosques, tendo como missão resgatar a cidade dos invasores da Coreia do Norte e conquistar a sua liberdade.

programme.title: Oliver Twist
programme.desc: Oliver Twist, um rapaz órfão, trava amizade com um carteirista nas ruas de Londres e acaba por se juntar a um grupo de rapazes treinados para roubar para o seu mestre.

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Retrato dos últimos quatro meses da vida de Abraham Lincoln, durante o difícil período da Guerra Civil, altura em que o então presidente trava outra importante batalha na história americana: a votação da 13ª emenda, que viria a abolir a escravatura.

programme.title: O Sapateiro Mágico
programme.desc: Um sapateiro, cansado da vida rotineira que leva, tem a oportunidade mágica de viver a vida nos sapatos dos outros e, assim, ver o mundo de forma totalmente diferente.

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: Este filme segue os dias que antecederam a Batalha da Normandia, em 1944. Enquanto discute os primeiros planos da invasão aliada a França com Roosevelt, Churchill sente-se perdido e conta com o apoio da esposa para ultrapassar os seus medos.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: O explorador Dirk Pitt tem a aventura da sua vida quando embarca numa caça ao tesouro em África. Pitt procura o Navio da Morte, uma embarcação perdida durante a Guerra Civil Americana, que trazia a bordo uma carga secreta. Mas o navio pode estar ligado às misteriosas mortes que têm ocorrido.

programme.title: Flightplan - Pânico a Bordo
programme.desc: Kyle enfrenta o pior pesadelo de qualquer mãe quando a filha, de seis anos, desaparece em pleno voo. A passageira exige uma busca ao avião, tentando desesperadamente provar a sua sanidade. Em pânico e totalmente só nesta jornada, Kyle conta apenas com a própria astúcia para resolver o mistério.

programme.title: O Sétimo Filho
programme.desc: Numa era em que reina a feitiçaria e as lendas e a magia colidem, o último guerreiro de uma ordem mística parte numa viagem para encontrar um profetizado herói que nasceu com poderes especiais: o último Sétimo Filho.

programme.title: Green Lantern - Lanterna Verde
programme.desc: Quando um novo inimigo, Parallax, ameaça destruir o Universo, uma força de elite de protetores da paz e justiça é chamada à ação: o Corpo dos Lanternas Verdes. O seu mais recente recruta é o piloto Hal Jordan, que ganha super poderes graças a um anel extraterrestre.

programme.title: Esquadrão de Vigilantes
programme.desc: Os elementos de uma equipa de operações especiais transformam-se em combatentes na luta contra o crime! Eles são liderados por um anti-herói conhecido apenas como "O Vigilante".

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Norberto Barba, Terrence O'Hara, Eric Laneuville, Aaron Lipstadt, Peter Werner
